Module guigame
Package guigame.logic.event

Interface EventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
ButtonListener, KeyboardPressedEventListener, LeaveGameAsker, PlayersChangedEventListener, StartGameEventListener
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface
public interface EventListener
This interface has the important function for an EventListener. The actionPerformed is triggered by an EventListener.action().
See Also:
Event.action()

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void actionPerformed​(Event e)
    Invoke when a fitting Event was triggered.

  • Method Details

    • actionPerformed

      void actionPerformed​(Event e)
      Invoke when a fitting Event was triggered.
      Parameters:
      e - the Event to get options from (should be a subclass of Event)
